install.name: Content
install.author: ARTIO s.r.o.
install.description: Adds SEO support for Content component.

param.name: pagination
param.label: Handle pagination as non-SEF
param.description: If set to Yes, limit and limitstart variables will be appended to URL as non-SEF.

param.name: guessId
param.label: Guess Itemid
param.description: If set to Yes, the extension will try to guess the correct Itemid and replace the one given in URL.

param.name: compatibility
param.label: Compatibility mode
param.description: Makes sure the task variable is present in the URL. Helps some legacy components like mXcomment.

param.name: show_category
param.label: Show Category
param.description: Show category in URL

param.name: show_section
param.label: Show Section
param.description: Show section in URL

param.name: title_alias
param.label: Title URL part
param.description:
Title URL part
Google News numbering must be enabled for Google News number option to work.

param.name: category_alias
param.label: Category URL part
param.description: Category URL part

param.name: section_alias
param.label: Section URL part
param.description: Section URL part

param.name: add_layout
param.label: Add layout to URL
param.description: How to handle the layout parameter

param.name: def_layout
param.label: Default layout
param.description: Which layout consider as default

param.name: googlenewsnum
param.label: Google News numbering
param.description: You can choose what number to use in article title for Google News.

param.name: digits
param.label: Article ID digits
param.description: Minimum article ID digits count, Google News requires three. Necessary number of zeros will be prepended.

param.name: dateformat
param.label: Custom date format
param.description: Custom date format. You can use d, dd, m, mm, yy and yyyy in usual way.

param.name: iddatesep
param.label: ID and date separator
param.description: A string to separate ID and date parts if both used.

param.name: iddateorder
param.label: ID and date ordering
param.description: Ordering of ID and date parts if both used.

param.name: numberpos
param.label: Number position
param.description: You can choose if the number should be prepended or appended to article title.

param.name: meta_titlecat
param.label: Add category to page title
param.description: Adds article category to article name in page title

param.name: meta_desc
param.label: Generate description
param.description: Automatically generates meta description

param.name: desc_len
param.label: Description length
param.description: Meta description maximum length.

param.name: meta_keys
param.label: Generate keywords
param.description: Automatically generates meta keywords

param.name: keys_minlen
param.label: Minimum keyword length
param.description: Minimum length a word must have to be listed as a keyword.

param.name: keys_count
param.label: Number of keywords
param.description: Number of meta keywords.
